address.deliveryPoint: Museum fuer Naturkunde Berlin, Tierstimmenarchiv, Invalidenstraße 43, D-10155 Berlin, Germany

abstract.para: The Animal Sound Archive at the Museum fuer Naturkunde Berlin (German: Tierstimmenarchiv) is one of the oldest and largest worldwide. Founded in 1951 by Professor Guenter Tembrock the collection consists now of around 130 000 records of animal voices.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.
